alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches over central and southern areas of the eastern slopes of the Wind River Mountains including South Pass. Only 2 to 4 inches over the north including Union Pass. Northeast winds between 20 and 30 mph with gusts around 45 mph decreasing in the afternoon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel over South Pass will be impossible today. Highway 28 over South Pass could be closed for a couple of days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant blowing and drifting of snow with drifts of several feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
